document.title: Reference for `eif_type_by_reference'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_cecil.h"
EIF_TYPE_ID eif_type_by_reference (EIF_REFERENCE reference);
2DESCRIPTION The eif_type_by_reference() function returns the type identifier corresponding to reference.
2RETURN VALUE Type identifier of reference. The behavior is unknown if reference is not a valid Eiffel reference.
2CONFORMANCE Eiffel Software Eiffel 4. 5 and later.
2SEE ALSO
eif_type(1) , eif_name(1), eif_type_id(1).
